Summary Management profile : 
 
A results-oriented international senior manager with over 18 years of international management experience in the Information Technology, and Telecommunications Industries, including strategy planning, product marketing, and business development in world class companies.  
 
I successfully acquired the ability to work with customers and partners from initial strategy planning through solution delivery. Creative, thoughtful and self-motivated, I have the ability to adapt myself into different environments and cultures. Fluent in Spanish and English, with intermediate level in Portuguese.  
 
Experienced in managing product portfolios, programs, and negotiations supporting internal/external stakeholders in order to achieve business goals efficiently.

- Manage all aspects of key Commercial and Carrier accounts with respect to Services

- Evaluate and analyze market research, identify opportunities, and recommend business development actions.

- Work directly with the global content development teams and Business Units to provide insight on local product requirements and to develop new and innovative mapping products and features.

Summary •	I am a corporate professional with diverse experience and measurable achievements in all facets of management; account management, sales management, and professional services management. 
•	Currently I am the Senior Client Services Manager at Cisco Systems, where I am playing a major role in maximizing business outcomes to our customers with a focus on business growth of Cisco innovation solutions and profitability.  
•	Having served in key positions with leading multinationals, HP, Logica, Acision and Cisco, I have developed leadership and entrepreneurial skills, business, technical and management skills, and nurtured excellent relationship across industries, effective enterprise and consultative selling skills. 
•	Strong business acumen and communication, influencing/negotiation and leadership skills coupled with hands-on approach, demonstrating comfort with technical and industry solutions, products and services knowledge and applying these perspectives to solving business needs. 
•	Quality conscious, result–driven, possessing strong people, motivation and engagement, interpersonal, analytical, organizational and management skills coupled with excellent technical and functional orientation and project management experience.  
•	Highly adaptable well-trained with wide exposure to international professional practices, Independent thinking, creative and entrepreneurial global perspective and willing to travel, ability to put ideas into action, learning agility and ability to coach. 
•	A team player and able to collaborate with local and regional teams with a proven ability to respond and manage challenges in a fast moving business environments.  
•	I achieved outstanding results and transformational success stories through being customer-centric, focused on building a strong team, enabling the partner community, and executing the GTM model most effectively. I received several awards for outstanding sales achievements.

Summary Edmundo Arias is Client Services Manager for Cisco Systems in Colombia. He joined Cisco in August 2005 and focused on Service Provider accounts in Venezuela, Colombia and Ecuador. From 2006 to 2008 he led Cisco Services Sales for SP, Enterprise and Public Sector segments in Venezuela with successful results and exceeding growth plans. Edmundo has +20 years of Service Sales Management experience in IT/Telecom and Professional Services at leading ICT Multinational Companies, including: Cisco, AT&T, EDS and Getronics in the Andean and Caribbean Region. Key fields of business development have been: network integration, ICT outsourcing, Telecom service provider and IT consulting services, with focus on sales strategy & planning, account and channel management as well as consultative sales of professional services targeting large service providers, corporate and medium size companies across Latin America and The Caribbean. 
 
Edmundo holds a Bachelor’s degree in Systems Engineering from Universidad Metropolitana in Caracas-Venezuela, and a Master in Finance from the same University.
